path: PDF Library/30 Rock Studio Maintenance - Remote Support Documents/OpenVPN/OpenVPN setup for PCR Operators.docx
text: Please see directions for OpenVPN set up: https://nbcuni.sharepoint.com/sites/dtcm/SitePages/Work-from-Home.aspx This should be good to get people up and running even though this is geared towards creatives. The only difference is the OpenVPN file. I have attached the OpenVPN file for pcr use here. The only other difference would be to use the connection URI: pcr.vprod.io instead of peacock.vprod.io.
